text: Trevor Denton is an English former professional rugby league footballer who played in the 1960s and 1970s. He played at club level for Doncaster (Heritage № 266), and Halifax (loan) (Heritage № 807), as a , i.e. number 6. ==Background== Trevor Denton worked as an electrician for the National Coal Board (NCB) at Lofthouse Colliery in Wakefield, and Prince of Wales Colliery in Pontefract. ==References== ==External links== * Search for "Denton" at rugbyleagueproject.org Category:Doncaster R.L.F.C. players Category:Halifax R.L.F.C. players Category:Place of birth missing Category:Rugby league five- eighths Category:Rugby league players Category:Year of birth missing
title: Trevor Denton
